dcterms:description: The dataset consists of high-density EEG data collected from seven drug-resistant epilepsy patients, including spatial locations of stimulus contacts in MRI space, Freesurfer surface space, and MNI152 space for each subject, along with the digital coordinates of 256 scalp EEG electrodes.
dcterms:title: Localize-MI
